# Class TextChunkingNode

Text chunking node for breaking large text into smaller pieces (a stream of token chunks). This node processes streaming text data and converts it into discrete text chunks.

#### Input

[TextStreamData](./common_data_types_external_text_stream_data.TextStreamData) \- The data type that TextChunkingNode accepts as input

#### Output

[TextData](./common_data_types_external_text_data.TextData) \- The data type that TextChunkingNode accepts as output

#### Example


```
const chunkingNode = new TextChunkingNode(&#123;  id: 'my-chunking-node',  reportToClient: true&#125;);

```

constructor

toGraphConfigNode
